cot: The evidence and testimony that contradict each other are Evidence 15 (Hold Entry Record) and Testimony 2 ("That's why my name doesn't appear on the hold entry record."). Sorin claims his name doesn't appear on the hold entry record, but the Hold Entry Record (Evidence 15) would likely show his name if he had entered the hold, contradicting his statement.
